content: --स्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (also written अंतस्थ) being between or in the midst. (--स्थः --स्थाः a term applied to the semivowels, य्, र्, ल्, व् as standing between vowels and consonants and being formed by a slight contact of the vocal organs (ईषत्स्पृष्टं अंतस्थानां); or they are so called because they stand between स्पर्श (क-म) letters and उष्मन् (श, ष, स, ह).
